MacRumors' iPad 3 Logic Board Photos

Feb 20, 2012

MacRumors' iPad 3 Logic Board Photos

Who knows if this will turn out to be true, but it at least seems plausible.  It makes sense that Apple would stagger their major update schedule in order to “regroup” after each major revision.  One major question that remains regards the software:  Will there be any major design changes to iOS?  I’m guessing not.

I’m also hoping the “A5X” will make it’s way to the Apple TV.
